title: [Health] Days featuring high profile football matches in Europe were associated with more traffic accidents in Asia than were days with lower profile matches. A potential causal mechanism may be Asian drivers losing sleep by watching high profile matches, which are often played in middle of night in Asia.

[Epidemiology] Researchers from the University of Massachusetts have now examined the risk of infection when driving. They wanted to find out how the air currents in the vehicle interior run in different ventilation scenarios and how that influences the risk of the transmission.
